## ReconciledDeliverySearchInput interface

Input to the reconciled search operation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReconciledDeliverySearchInput<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [predicate](./component-api.reconcileddeliverysearchinput.predicate.md) | <code>UnaryFunction&lt;T, boolean&gt;</code> | Matcher function that tests if a particular value matches the search query |
|  [query](./component-api.reconcileddeliverysearchinput.query.md) | <code>QueryInput</code> | The search query object used to execute a query equivalent to the matcher |
